function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High and frequent fluctuations in the overall economy","Impact":"Job loss, imbalance in payments, and reduced investment in infrastructure and development.","Mitigation":"Implementation of economic policies, subsidies, and financial support.","Technologies":"Economic forecasting models, financial management software, and economic stimulus packages.","People":"Contractors, small and medium enterprises, and workers in the construction industry.","Owner":"Government, financial institutions, and economic experts."},{"Description":"Economic decline due to pandemic impact","Impact":"Increased unemployment, reduced consumer spending, and slowing down of construction projects.","Mitigation":"Pandemic recovery plans, financial aid, and investment in public infrastructure.","Technologies":"Digital payment systems, remote work technology, and contactless infrastructure development.","People":"Small and medium enterprises, construction companies, and workers in affected industries.","Owner":"Government, health organizations, and economic development agencies."}]}
